>>> bytestring = b'\x00\x01\x02\x04'
>>>
>>>
>>> bytestring
b'\x00\x01\x02\x04'
>>> f = open('/lfs1/test.bin', 'wb')
>>> f.write(bytestring)
4
>>> f.close()
>>>
>>> f = open('/lfs1/test.bin', 'rb')
>>> hex(f.read(64))
'00010204'
